alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sour Lake, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Sour Lake, Saratoga, Bevil Oaks, China, and Batson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
